revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: I and those with me are greeting you in the name of our Lord. Just as it is your duty to help all the brothers in the name of our Lord, you shall give your love to these sisters, too, who are brought to the epitropos, through what you will offer them. In the name of our Lord, I wish that you are well.

listBibl.bibl: P. Got. 11 Schmidt, C., Theologische Literaturzeitung 55, 1930, c. 227-229 Naldini, M., Il Cristianesimo in Egitto, 23, Firenze 1968, p. 139-140 Zucker, F., Byzantinische Zeitschrift 29, 1929/30, p. 96; Schubart, W., Gnomon 6, 1930, p. 611; Ghedini, G., La scuola cattolica 61, fasc. 4, 1933 (not 1953), p. 382-385; BL II 2, 69 (line 6); BL VI, 44 (about Naldini's new ed.); TM 30693
